resources.string:
With photup you can share your photos to your Facebook profile, quicker than ever before. Think of it as \'Facebook Camera\' for iOS, but on Android.
- Upload as many photos as you want, all at once in a batch - Add Effects (Filters) - Manually Rotate photos - Crop Photos - Set the caption of each photo - Easily Tag your Friends with Face Detection - Instant Upload. Automatically upload as soon you take a photo - Tag the location and place - Upload to your Groups or Events - Upload to your Page and it\'s albums
Coming soon: - More Privacy Options
Translations If you want to help translate photup. Go to: http://www.getlocalization.com/photup/
